note: A charitble organisation in Eastern Uganda, East Africa doing vulnerable work to support the needy, widow, orphans and other categories who in need. We do activities such as food aid, Ramadan project, WATER WELL installation, bore hole repair,iftr, qurban, construction of masjid and Quranic schools, and renovation, Sadaqah and aqiqah empowerment of women, Quran and school material distribution, clothing distribution and many others.
